aircraft.value: Banshee Fast - AC-8984-615 at Forward Operating Base-3

defect_observed.value: Cargo hook release malfunction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 25/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 26/11/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 26/11/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 28/11/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 03/12/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
